name: U-Pet
description:
U-Pet

-WASD to Move, Mouse to look, F to interact-

Play with a virtual buddy! Poke around your pet room, change the color of the walls and eat some delicious snacks!

Your mouse cursor is hidden within the game screen. Press escape or delete and move it off the screen to reveal it again. Click back in the screen to hide.
Video rendering is not supported in WebGL, so one one wall of the room there is a still image instead. If you would like to see the game with the video player, please use the windows or mac builds.

This game was made in 9 days. Design, programming, and modeling by Jordan Grayson. Song by Kevin Macleod. Font by SmokingDrum. Sound Effects from Zapsplat.com. Textures from sketchuptextureclub.com.

Backbay Lounge by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3408-backbay-lounge
